languages.text: "В отсеке НП-А14 зафиксирована вспышка болезни высокой заразности, однако жалоб от рабочих почти нет — несмотря на многочисленные патологии, люди исправно трудятся. Это необычный случай, который я досконально изучу".

"There has been an outbreak of a highly contagious disease in Bay LD-A14, but the complaints from the workers there have been few — despite the many pathologies, the people continue working without interruptions. A curious case, which I will study thoroughly."
languages.original_text: "В отсеке НП-А14 зафиксирована вспышка болезни высокой заразности, однако жалоб от рабочих почти нет — несмотря на многочисленные патологии, люди исправно трудятся. Это необычный случай, который я досконально изучу".

languages.text: "Es gab einen Ausbruch einer hochansteckenden Krankheit in Bucht LD-A14, aber uns liegen kaum Beschwerden der dortigen Arbeiter vor – trotz der vielen Pathologien arbeiten die Leute ohne Unterbrechungen weiter. Ein seltsamer Fall, den ich genau analysieren werde."
languages.original_text: "There has been an outbreak of a highly contagious disease in Bay LD-A14, but the complaints from the workers there have been few — despite the many pathologies, the people continue working without interruptions. A curious case, which I will study thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: "Es gab einen Ausbruch einer hochansteckenden Krankheit in Bucht LD-A14, aber uns liegen kaum Beschwerden der dortigen Arbeiter vor – trotz der vielen Pathologien arbeiten die Leute ohne Unterbrechungen weiter. Ein seltsamer Fall, den ich genau analysieren werde."

languages.text: « Une épidémie galopante a frappé la baie LD-A14, mais rares sont les ouvriers à s'en être plaints. Malgré les nombreuses pathologies qui sévissent à bord, vos gens continuent de travailler sans interruption. Un cas étrange, que je ne manquerai pas d'étudier de manière approfondie. »
languages.original_text: "There has been an outbreak of a highly contagious disease in Bay LD-A14, but the complaints from the workers there have been few — despite the many pathologies, the people continue working without interruptions. A curious case, which I will study thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: « Une épidémie galopante a frappé la baie LD-A14, mais rares sont les ouvriers à s'en être plaints. Malgré les nombreuses pathologies qui sévissent à bord, vos gens continuent de travailler sans interruption. Un cas étrange, que je ne manquerai pas d'étudier de manière approfondie. »

languages.text: «Se ha producido un brote de una enfermedad sumamente contagiosa en la bahía LD-A14, pero los trabajadores apenas se han quejado; pese a las numerosas patologías, la gente continúa con su labor sin interrupciones. Se trata de un caso curioso que pretendo estudiar detenidamente».
languages.original_text: "There has been an outbreak of a highly contagious disease in Bay LD-A14, but the complaints from the workers there have been few — despite the many pathologies, the people continue working without interruptions. A curious case, which I will study thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha producido un brote de una enfermedad sumamente contagiosa en la bahía LD-A14, pero los trabajadores apenas se han quejado; pese a las numerosas patologías, la gente continúa con su labor sin interrupciones. Se trata de un caso curioso que pretendo estudiar detenidamente».

languages.text: 「LD-A14ベイで伝染性の強い病気が発生しましたが、そこで働いている労働者からの苦情はほとんどありませんでした。さまざまな病原菌があるにもかかわらず、人民は休むことなく働き続けています。興味深いケースですので、徹底的に調べてみる所存です」
languages.original_text: "There has been an outbreak of a highly contagious disease in Bay LD-A14, but the complaints from the workers there have been few — despite the many pathologies, the people continue working without interruptions. A curious case, which I will study thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: 「LD-A14ベイで伝染性の強い病気が発生しましたが、そこで働いている労働者からの苦情はほとんどありませんでした。さまざまな病原菌があるにもかかわらず、人民は休むことなく働き続けています。興味深いケースですので、徹底的に調べてみる所存です」

languages.text: “LD-A14区甲板爆发了极具传染性的疾病，但工人们却几乎没反馈过这件事情。尽管很多人都生了病，但大家依然继续正常工作，没有受到干扰。这样的状况相当反常，我打算好好研究研究。”
languages.original_text: "There has been an outbreak of a highly contagious disease in Bay LD-A14, but the complaints from the workers there have been few — despite the many pathologies, the people continue working without interruptions. A curious case, which I will study thoroughly."

traits.locale_text: “LD-A14区甲板爆发了极具传染性的疾病，但工人们却几乎没反馈过这件事情。尽管很多人都生了病，但大家依然继续正常工作，没有受到干扰。这样的状况相当反常，我打算好好研究研究。”

languages.text: "LD-A14 Bölmesi'nde son derece bulaşıcı bir hastalık salgını başladı ancak işçilerden az sayıda şikâyet alıyoruz. Çokça patolojiye rağmen insanlar, kesintisiz şekilde çalışmayı sürdürüyor. Detaylıca inceleyeceğim, tuhaf bir durum."
languages.original_text: "There has been an outbreak of a highly contagious disease in Bay LD-A14, but the complaints from the workers there have been few — despite the many pathologies, the people continue working without interruptions. A curious case, which I will study thoroughly."
